verbs.description: It [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [ARG2: Donald Trump 's fault] [ARG1: that NFL players have disrespected the National Anthem and the U.S. military] .
It is n't Donald Trump 's fault that NFL players [V: have] disrespected the National Anthem and the U.S. military .
It is n't Donald Trump 's fault that [ARG0: NFL players] have [V: disrespected] [ARG1: the National Anthem and the U.S. military] .
